edu.northwestern.at.utils
Class FileNameUtils

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.at.utils.FileNameUtils

public class FileNameUtils
extends java.lang.Object

File name utilities.

This static class provides various utility methods for manipulating file and directory names.

stripPathName

public static java.lang.String stripPathName(java.lang.String fileName)
Strips path from a file name.

Parameters:
fileName - File name with possible path.
Returns:
File name stripped of path.

changeFileExtension

public static java.lang.String changeFileExtension(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                   java.lang.String newExtension)
Change extension of file name.

Parameters:
fileName - The file name whose extension is to be changed.
newExtension - The new file name extension.
Returns:
The file name with the extension changed to new extension.

Null returned if file name or new extension null.

getFileExtension

public static java.lang.String getFileExtension(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                boolean keepPeriod)
Get file extension from file name.

Parameters:
fileName - The file name whose extension is wanted.
keepPeriod - Keep the period in the extension.
Returns:
The extension, if any, with the optional leading period.

getContentTypeFor

public static java.lang.String getContentTypeFor(java.lang.String fileName)
Get MIME type for a filename.

Parameters:
fileName - Name of file for which mime type is desired.
Returns:
The mime type, e.g., "text/plain".

When the file name's extension is not found in the mime types hash table, a mime type of "application/octet-stream" is returned.

fileExists

public static boolean fileExists(java.lang.String fileName)
Checks if a file exists.

Parameters:
fileName - The file name to check for existence.
Returns:
True if file exists.

expandWildcards

public static java.lang.String[] expandWildcards(java.lang.String fileSpec)
Expand file name wildcard.

Parameters:
fileSpec - File spec possibly containing "*" wildcard.
Returns:
String array of expanded file names. Only file names for existing files are returned, so result may be zero length string array.

fixFileSeparators

public static java.lang.String fixFileSeparators(java.lang.String fileName)
Fix file separators.

Parameters:
fileName - File name to fix.
Returns:
File name with file separators fixed.

Escapes the file separators if they are "\" characters.

expandFileNameWildcards

public static java.lang.String[] expandFileNameWildcards(java.lang.String[] wildCardNames)
Expand the file name wildcards.

Parameters:
wildCardNames - File names with possible wildcards.
Returns:
String array of expanded file names.

File names expressed as URLs are left untouched and any wildcard characters they contains are left as-is.

createVersionedFileName

public static java.lang.String createVersionedFileName(java.lang.String fileName)
Create versioned file name.

Parameters:
fileName - Candidate file name.
Returns:
Possibly revised file name with version number added if candidate file name already exists.

createVersionedFileName

public static java.lang.String createVersionedFileName(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                       int versionNumber,
                                                       java.lang.String versionFormat)
Create versioned file name.

Parameters:
fileName - Candidate file name.
versionNumber - Candidate version number .
versionFormat - PrintF format for version number.
Returns:
Possibly revised file name with version number added if candidate file name already exists. The version number is adjusted as necessary.
